entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Core 0.17.0.1 released
entry.summary: Bitcoin Core has released version 0.17.0.1, which is available for download on its official website or through BitTorrent. The new major version release includes new features, bug fixes, performance improvements, and updated translations. Users are advised to report bugs using the issue tracker at GitHub and subscribe to receive security and update notifications.The latest version addresses an issue with OSX dmg generation that could cause Finder to crash on installation. This problem only affected macOS 10.12 to 10.14, and there are no significant changes for other operating systems. The release credits Jonas Schnelli, Pieter Wuille, Sjors Provoost, and Wladimir J. van der Laan for their contributions to this release.The announcement also includes PGP signature verification to ensure the authenticity of the message. Users can be confident in the safety and security of the updated software. Overall, the release offers important fixes and updates for bitcoin users, making it a recommended upgrade for all those using Bitcoin Core.
